flavorText: With heavy heart, Urza doused one world's light to rekindle another's.

foreignData.name: Weltenkollaps
foreignData.text: Wenn während Deiner Versorgungsphase vier oder mehr Kreaturen im Spiel sind, opfere den Weltenkollaps und zerstöre alle Kreaturen im Spiel. Diese können in diesem Zug nicht regeneriert werden.

name: Planar Collapse
originalText: During your upkeep, if there are four or more creatures in play, sacrifice Planar Collapse and destroy all creatures. Those creatures cannot be regenerated this turn.

rulings.text: This ability does not trigger at all if there are not 4 or more creatures on the battlefield. It also checks this at the start of resolution and does nothing if this is not still true.
If this card is not on the battlefield when the ability resolves, then you can’t sacrifice it. However, you still destroy all creatures.

text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more creatures on the battlefield, sacrifice Planar Collapse and destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
